body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Louis White and the customer's name is Barbara Johnson.  The conversation is about a company called Count on Us (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about typical situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling ABC Tech Solutions. My name is Alex. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, I’m having some trouble with my laptop.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Can I get your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Can I also get the model number of your laptop so I can better assist you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's model one two three four A B C.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Lastly, can I have your email address in case we get disconnected and need to follow up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's johndoe at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I appreciate the information. Let me look into this issue for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, John. I will get back to you shortly with a solution. Have a great day!
